channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed

item.title: Ukraine's halt of Russian gas to Europe throws breakaway Moldovan region into crisis mode
item.description: Moldova's Transnistria region has been thrust into an energy crisis following the termination of a gas transit agreement between Russia and Ukraine.

item.title: Forget Santa: Stock-market bulls look to ‚ÄòJanuary barometer‚Äô for clues to 2025
item.description: Santa Claus is looking like a no-show on Wall Street, but stock-market bulls may be able to take their lump of coal in stride if January gets the year off to a positive start.

item.title: GM, Ford report best annual U.S. sales since 2019
item.description: Both General Motors and Ford Motor on Friday reported their best annual U.S. new vehicle sales since 2019.

item.title: Biden blocks U.S. Steel takeover by Japan's Nippon Steel, citing national security
item.description: U.S. Steel's stock opened down more than 7% in trading Friday following the president's announcement.

item.title: Treasury yields steady after ISM‚Äôs stronger-than-expected manufacturing reading
item.description: Yields on U.S. government debt were little changed Friday morning after a manufacturing-related reading showed signs of improvement for the struggling sector.

item.title: Trump touts Mike Johnson for House speaker as Republican faces tight vote
item.description: Republicans, who hold a slim majority of seats in the House, twice in the past two years have struggled to reach a consensus on who should be speaker.

item.title: Manufacturers end 2024 in a slump, but rising orders raise hopes for recovery
item.description: American manufacturers ended 2024 just as they began it ‚Äî in a mild slump that still shows little sign of ending ahead of President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs return to the White House.

item.title: JetBlue fined $2 million by DOT for 'chronically delayed flights'
item.description: The Department of Transportation said its $2 million fine against JetBlue was the first of its kind for chronically delayed flights.

item.title: IT disruption causes delays at German airports, police say
item.description: German federal police are experiencing a countrywide IT systems outage at airports, a spokesperson said on Friday.

item.title: Rivian meets its 2024 vehicle production target after lowering projections
item.description: Rivian on Friday said it produced 49,476 electric vehicles last year.

item.title: Trump says Britain is 'making a very big mistake' with windfall tax on North Sea oil producers
item.description: U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Friday called on Britain to "open up" the North Sea and get rid of "windmills."
